properties.title: Bergseehütte SAC
properties.description: The cabin is located above Göscheneralpsee with a splendid view to Dammastock. Climbing is the main interest here. There are several equipped climbing sectors nearby, and on Bergseeschijen you will find a via ferrata which is even feasible for experienced children. The spacious summer cabin is a stopover on the challenging alpine «Fünf-Hütten-Panoramaweg» (Five Hut High Route). Swimming in the lake is possible; youth groups staying in the house may use the zip-line across the lake if supervised by a competent person.
